sentence.Network_en: This will give your promotional material individuality and style.

sentence.Network_cn: 个性鲜明是英国人固有的、也是他们看重的特点。

sentence.Network_en: In presenting a more professional image the party risks losing its individuality.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了给人一种更为职业的形象，该党可能会丧失自身特色。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: in early use from medieval Latin individualitas

entry.def: The individuality of a person or thing consists of the qualities that make them different from other people or things.

example.ex: People should be free to express their individuality...
example.tran: 人们应该能自由表达他们的个性。

example.ex: This will give your promotional material individuality and style.
example.tran: 这会让你的促销品显得个性十足、格调高雅。

sentences.sentence: "so absorbed by the movement that she lost all sense of individuality"

means.word_mean: 2. the distinct personality of an individual regarded as a persisting entity;

sentences.sentence: "you can lose your identity when you join the army"

Sentence.sentence: In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture.
